chapter.title: Components
chapter.para: FIXME: This chapter is way out of date.
GStreamer includes components that people can include in their programs.

sect1.title: GstPlay
sect1.para: GstPlay is a GtkWidget with a simple API to play, pause and stop a media file.

sect1.title: GstMediaPlay
sect1.para: GstMediaply is a complete player widget.

sect1.title: GstEditor
sect1.para: GstEditor is a set of widgets to display a graphical representation of a pipeline.
